entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a hero in the Gryffindor common room that night. He has a giant head on the wall that says things like 'The Ministry are morons' and 'Eat dung, Umbridge'. His scar began prickling uncomfortably again.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who put an Enlargement Charm on the front cover of The Quibbler.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the twins who put an Enlargement Charm on the front cover of The Quibbler.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as not finding the poster very amusing and going to bed early out of irritation.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as being called 'morons' by Harry's giant head on the wall.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as being insulted by Harry's giant head on the wall.

relationships.description: Harry's giant head insults The Ministry.
Fred and George collaborate to put an Enlargement Charm on the front cover of The Quibbler.
